PR is merged. Please leave a blank newline before the `---`, otherwise
GitHub will format the text above it as a title.

To indicate co-authors, include lines at the bottom of the commit message
(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Co-authored-by: Author Name <author@email.com>

Any other comments you want to keep out of the PR commit should go
below the `---`, and placed outside this HTML comment, or else they
will be invisible to reviewers.

If this PR depends on other PRs, please list them below this comment,
using the following format:
- [ ] depends on: #abc [optional extra text]

nodes.body: ðŸš€ Pull request has been placed on the maintainer queue by Ruben-VandeVelde.

Pull request successfully merged into master.

Build succeeded:
  * [Build](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/8960504597/job/24607084873)
  * [Check all files imported](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/8960504597/job/24607084924)
  * [Lint style](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/8960504597/job/24607084752)
Thanks for the contribution! I have some relatively minor comments/suggestions below.
I think this should have (\cdot + \cdot) rather than Nat.add

```suggestion
    ofDigits b (hd :: tl) = hd + b * ofDigits b tl := rfl
```
It had never occurred to me that ofDigits supported unbalanced lists of digits (i.e., with numbers greater than the base), but there doesn't seem to be an issue
I think we would generally make b, l1 and l2 implicit arguments
That's a very long name. Is there something else that ofDigits_add_ofDigits could be that you need to distinguish it from?

I decided to name it that way as it is analogous to a theorem about List, [List.sum_add_sum_eq_sum_zipWith_of_length_eq](https://leanprover-community.github.io/mathlib4_docs/Mathlib/Algebra/BigOperators/List/Basic.html#List.sum_add_sum_eq_sum_zipWith_of_length_eq).
To be honest, I have not given much thought into the name so if you think it would be better to change it to "ofDigits_add_ofDigits" then I will.

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - feat(Nat/Digits): ofDigits_add_ofDigits_eq_ofDigits_zipWith_of_length_eq
